name: immich
description: Immich is a self hosted photo and video backup solution for mobile and desktop. It offers automatic uploads, face recognition, maps, albums and multi user support, providing a private alternative to big cloud photo services.
features: Photo Backup: Automatic mobile uploads, Background sync, Original quality preservation. Never lose a memory.
Face Recognition: AI-powered face detection, Person grouping, Smart search. Find people instantly.
Albums: Shared albums, Collaborative collections, Privacy controls. Organize beautifully.
Timeline: Chronological view, Date-based browsing, Memory lane. Relive your moments.
Search: AI-powered object detection, Location search, Date filtering. Find anything fast.
Multi-User: Family sharing, User permissions, Separate libraries. Perfect for households.
Mobile Apps: iOS and Android, Native performance, Offline viewing. Access everywhere.
Video Support: Video uploads, Transcoding, Streaming playback. Full media library.
Maps: Location-based browsing, GPS data, Travel memories. See where you've been.
Privacy: Self-hosted storage, No cloud dependency, Complete control. Your photos, your server.
Machine Learning: Local AI processing, Object recognition, Smart categorization. Intelligent organization.
